name.ja: <ruby>道化の一座<rt>クラウン・クラン</rt></ruby>『怪演』

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each of these effects of "Clown Clan "Soiree"" once per turn); you cannot activate the effects of monsters Special Summoned from the Deck or Extra Deck until the end of the next turn after this card resolves.
● Special Summon up to 2 "Clown Clan" monsters from your Deck and/or Extra Deck, ignoring their Summoning conditions.
● Add 1 "Clown Clan" monster from your Deck to your hand.
During the Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Tribute Summon 1 "Clown Clan" monster face-up.
